Name: Cuban Heal
Ingredients: 75 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Honey-ed and initially sweet with herbal spirity rum notes adding depth.
History: Created in 2008 by Matthew Keegan at Blanch House, Brighton, England. The ingredients were chosen due to their historically being believed to be remedies.
